storyInfo: Team Rainbow resolves the misunderstanding with Tecno and gets to experience the creativity and vitality of the artists. Ela passes on what she sees to Reynell, in hopes he would go and see the street art community for himself. Reynell seems open to the idea.

attributes.content: ...My head hurts.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: There you are, big guy. Here, ice for that bump on your head.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Y-You're the kid who attacked me?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Call me a kid again, and you'll get another bump on the back of your head.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: They found the meds they lost, so the misunderstanding with us has been resolved...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Meds? Misunderstanding? Resolved?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: It wasn't so hard persuading that poor driver to cooperate, after all.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Wha... I'm even more confused now... where are we?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Come, see for yourself.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Here's your medicine. Careful with it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Th-Thank you...
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: What's your name? Check it off the list.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Mike... there.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Two portions left.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Let me check the list again. Maybe someone forgot to come... see if anyone hasn't signed.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The last two are mine.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Here you go.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: *cough* I-I'm sorry about today. We didn't know someone else was behind the robbery...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: It's ok. Glad to see that the medicine ended up in the hands of those who need it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Gustave told me that a lot of people here are afflicted with a special condition that requires these suppressants to control.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: So... wasn't that Capitán at odds with Reynell? Why is he stealing our meds to suck up to Reynell now?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Miłosz told me that he's after Reynell's development rights in this district.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: And what if he gets it? Reynell had the rights himself, and he couldn't do anything about us.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Good thing too. It would be a shame if the local culture here got replaced by hotels and casinos.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You've only been here half a day, and you're talking like you know the place well.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: And in this half a day, everyone who came for their medicine was trying to promote their artwork to me.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: People have to eat, after all... what's that on your arm?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: A braided wristband. I didn't plan on buying it, but then I saw the kid's hands full of needle marks...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Whisper) Who could be so clumsy?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Uhh... I mean... would you like to take a break in my workshop?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: 50 million Columbian gold certificates! 50 million going once, 50 million going twice!
attributes.name: Auction Host

attributes.content: Sold for 50 million gold certificates!
attributes.name: Auction Host

attributes.content: What did you say? The warehouse that kept losing stuff? Which one?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The one from the pharmaceutical company that shut down six months after you acquired it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I seem to remember something of the sort... so, some people stole meds meant for that neighborhood, framed you for it, then tried to sneak those meds into that warehouse.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: To be precise, they tried to frame you.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What do you want me to do, then? Thank you for resolving the misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: There's no need for that, Mr. Reynell.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Miłosz says you're leaving the accommodations I arranged for you. Have you found your friends?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: No, we just found another place to stay.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Where?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: That neighborhood.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: There? Not that I'm against it or anything, but why?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I saw something interesting.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: This is my workshop. There's a lot of space here. I work together with other artists, looking for inspiration, sometimes exhibiting our work.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Are those wet papers abandoned drafts?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No, they're finished artwork.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Finished?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: There's a guy who leaves his paintings outside and lets the rain dissolve the paint. The work isn't finished until that step is done.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The man who's flexing his muscles... is he looking for inspiration?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Strictly speaking, he's a work of art too.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Performance art?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Read the plaque in front of him.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: 'Name: Pepe Turrión. Artist: Pepe Turrión's parents.'
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: 'Description: Six months after creating this work, the artists abandoned it in the suburbs of Dossoles due to lack of economic value.'
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: 'Little could they imagine that Pepe Turrión would become one of the greatest masterpieces of Dossoles twenty years later. Eat shit, jerks.'
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Wow...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I am the greatest Originium Artist in Dossoles. Would you like to see my Arts?
attributes.name: Solemn Man

attributes.content: Is he better than you, Tecno?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: No one's better, when it comes to Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Be careful and don't hurt our guests.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Solemn Man

attributes.content: The man takes out a few dark crystals from his pocket, each one glowing with an orange-yellow light. The visitors cautiously take a few steps back.
The pure Originium Prime crystals begin to spin in the man's palm. Then, he tosses them into the air one by one.
He begins to juggle pure Originium.
After a few rounds, he tosses all of them into the air at the same time, then looks up and catches the first one with his nose.
Then the next, and the next... finally, all the crystals form a tower on the tip of his nose.
The man turns slightly, and the tower of pure Originium slides back into his palm.
I thought Arts was about flashing lights and fireballs... that's Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: What is this, if not Originium? What did I demonstrate, if not arts?
attributes.name: Solemn Man

attributes.content: I... see...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: My biggest work lies beyond this door.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I think I've said this not too long ago, but I want to say it again—nothing could surprise me now.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Two mannequin heads? So big?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Those are just the heads. You haven't seen the bodies yet.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: They'll be dancing the night our arts festival begins.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: They will dance when the twin moons begin to set, and the sunlight has yet to shine.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: They will be the center of attention, the stars of the show. They will turn and pirouette on the streets, stepping in tune and gracing the entire community.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: A beautiful picture.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: I'm sure many people will be dancing with them.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No, maybe...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You don't know?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Nobody has danced in a long time, ever since that dance hall fire.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I told you, they've got innovative structures, deep emotions, delicate expressions.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Interesting... you've piqued my interest in what those people are doing.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: If you're going to that neighborhood, will you see what they're doing on my behalf?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I thought you weren't happy that they planned their arts festival on the same day as your opening ceremony.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Doesn't mean I can't be interested in what they're doing.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I can observe what they're doing on your behalf, but I have no reason to intervene in your conflict with them.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Of course not! Not that I wouldn't appreciate it if you could convince them to change the date.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I can't make you any promises.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You can't succeed if you don't try.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm surprised you're willing to learn more about what they're doing.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You wouldn't be surprised if you were willing to learn more about me.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Collection No. 257, antique music box, starting price 15 million gold certificates. Any bidders?
attributes.name: Auction Host

attributes.content: Shh... I have to focus.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: 20 million! Anyone else? 20 million!
attributes.name: Auction Host

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Er... same bidder to 25 million?
attributes.name: Auction Host

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: There's no one bidding against you.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I don't care what anyone else bids. I just want to raise it to the price I think it's worth.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I-I apologize for my rash decision...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: But we didn't think they would have the nerve to openly insult Coalition government forces that...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I-I understand! Next time—there won't be a next time!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I'll accept any punishment if this happens again! You can fire me, court-martial me, anything!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Capitán...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Shut up. Now the brass knows about that stupid truck driver.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: They stripped him naked and dropped him at our front door. The brass considers it an open insult to the Coalition government.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: They asked whether our relationship with Reynell can continue, whether there is hope of obtaining the land. What am I supposed to say?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Stupid, incompetent idiots.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Capitán, Reynell's secretary is here... do you want to see him?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Show him in.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: If you're just here to complain on Reynell's behalf, you can save it.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Of course not, Mr. Mateo. Reynell is satisfied with your efficiency. You were just a little... reckless.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: There are many Infected in that community. Stealing their medicine is one way to take them down. But you must understand that, if many Infected die because of it...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Making a big mess does none of us any good.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We understand. What else did he tell you?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: What he means is that, if you were too reckless before, perhaps a more cautious approach now can bring about a peaceful resolution.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We've gotten to this point, and you want me to negotiate with those people?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No, Mr. Mateo. There's no need for you to worry about it. Mr. Reynell has already sent someone to do it.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Miss Ela and her squad.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: You're familiar with them, no? Your men have had dealings with them, and people have even confused them with your men.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We have an agreement, Miłosz. Don't forget it.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No need to get excited, Mr. Mateo. Reynell doesn't intend to terminate his cooperation with you. He just asks for cooler heads.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We can talk about the land once you're calm enough to do so.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Is there any message that you would like me to deliver to Mr. Reynell?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I take my leave, then.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: You were playing games with me, weren't you, Reynell?!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: You're dead, Reynell, DEAD, if I don't get that piece of land from you!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: 150 million? He bid a music box to 150 million on his own?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: He may be eccentric, but he shows respect to what he considers art, in his own way.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It sounds like you're starting to change your mind about him.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I've never made up my mind about him, Meijer. He's not easy to make up your mind about.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Is that what makes him interesting?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I'll admit that he's not your traditional, boring art dealer.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: That's saying quite a bit, coming from you. You're not big on compliments usually.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: What now? Will you continue to work with him?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I'm not sure... but I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Come to think of it, we couldn't have adapted to this place so quickly without his help.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We did save his life, so we're even on that.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Hey, Ela... do you have a moment?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Of course. What is it?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Papá wants to see you.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Mr. Diaz? Why?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: He has some questions for you.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Very well, I'll go and see him.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: And just so you know... he might act pretty... angry.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: He wants to intimidate me.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: He may not admit it, but... yes.
attributes.name: Tecno
